content.raw:
Hi Dan,

I looked into this again after working on another project for a couple weeks. You were correct that it was an issue with the camera, rather than the server. It turns out that the trigger polarity for the Point Grey Chameleon3 CM3-U3-13S2M camera is the opposite of other Point Grey cameras. This solved both the one and two picture shot issues. 

Best,
Julia
content.html:
Hi Dan,

I looked into this again after working on another project for a couple weeks. You were correct that it was an issue with the camera, rather than the server. It turns out that the trigger polarity for the Point Grey Chameleon3 CM3-U3-13S2M camera is the opposite of other Point Grey cameras. This solved both the one and two picture shot issues.

Best, Julia
